snippet: England lost to Sri Lanka by nine wickets, further hurting its chances of making the World Cup quarterfinals, while Pakistan earned a 20-run victory over Zimbabwe for its first win in three matches.
abstract: Sri Lanka beats England by nine wickets in Cricket World Cup.
lead_paragraph: England lost to Sri Lanka by nine wickets, further hurting its chances of making the World Cup quarterfinals, while Pakistan earned a 20-run victory over Zimbabwe for its first win in three matches.

headline.main: Loss Dampens England’s Hopes in World Cup
